changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: If IndexProperty(Object_Id('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES'), 'INDEX_END_TIME', 'INDEXID') IS NULL CREATE INDEX INDEX_END_TIME ON ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES (END_TIME)

rollback.sql: If IndexProperty(Object_Id('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES'), 'INDEX_END_TIME', 'INDEXID') IS NOT NULL DROP INDEX INDEX_END_TIME
